metadata.Title: CVE-2021-23983 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
By causing a transition on a parent node by removing a CSS rule, an invalidproperty for a marker could have been applied, resulting in memorycorruption and a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 87.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-23983` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 87.0+build3-0ubuntu1
firefox-geckodriver - 87.0+build3-0ubuntu1
firefox-mozsymbols - 87.0+build3-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '87.0+build3-0ubuntu1').
mozjs78 package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
